name: Awakened Shrub
languages: one language known by its creator

actions.name: Rake
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 2 (1d4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Thorn
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +2 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the shrub remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal shrub.

special_abilities.name: Plant Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The shrub is resistant to exhaustion and to the paralyzed, petrified, and unconscious conditions.
